videos.description: Max Strus drains a 3-pointer with one second left to give the Heat an early nine-point lead over the Magic.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Max Strus beats the first-quarter buzzer for the Heat) 2021/12/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Max Strus beats the first-quarter buzzer for the Heat

videos.description: Gary Harris cuts into the Heat's lead with a nice shot plus the foul.
